comments.author: bob@bclary.com
comments.body:
It appears to be ok with the exception of js1_7/regress/regress-352797-02.js 

it should have the expect be a regexp as well.
var expect = /No Crash/;

Want to go ahead and make that change and check it in?

comments.author: norrisboyd@gmail.com
comments.body:
(In reply to comment #1)
> It appears to be ok with the exception of js1_7/regress/regress-352797-02.js 
> 
> it should have the expect be a regexp as well.
> var expect = /No Crash/;

Thanks, good catch

> 
> Want to go ahead and make that change and check it in?
>

description:
Created attachment 296184
patch for mozilla/js/tests directory

See attachment for a collection of changes to js/tests to enable those tests to cover both SpiderMonkey and Rhino.
summary: Generalize some tests for Rhino and Spidermonkey
